item.title: Install RDKit 2015-03 Build on Ubuntu 14.04 / Linux Mint 17
item.description: RDKit is an open source toolkit for cheminformatics. It has many functionalities to work with chemical files. Follow the below guide to install RDKit 2015-03 build on an Ubuntu 14.04 / Linux Mint 17 computer. Since Ubuntu packages don’t have the latest RDKit for trusty, you have to build RDKit from its source. Install Dependencies sudo apt-get install flex bison build-essential python-numpy cmake python-dev sqlite3 libsqlite3-dev libboost1.54-all-dev Download the Build
